Here in France, a stress relieving trend
called Yoga Yoga is
spreading throughout Paris. This trend is
especially popular among
office workers and people who are
facing extreme stress.
Yoga class base But playing with
puppies is the main thing. Each hour-long practice session
has up to 40 minutes to play
with the wonderful dogs and
relax with the cute little puppies that
Yoga class brings.
founder Ella rubinsky
said the idea was a
big hit in paris where many people work
long hours and live in
cramped apartments many of us
can't afford to keep dogs at home  or don't have
time to take them every day
so This is an opportunity to spend time
relaxing and having fun. Puy Yoga Paris organizes
many Sessions per week each session will often

cats  Children from 6 to 12 weeks old per
session costs 35 Euro from 39 USD
expected to increase to 45 Euro next month

B's city is an ice skating rink for the
community. This year is no exception, but the
special thing is that this time the ice rink is not
outdoors but inside.  Inside a
barok church, this barok church was built in the
18th century. But it is not currently used to
hold mass. The special feature of
skating in this space is that
people can slide through Christmas scenes.
Watch the next night's images
projected onto the ceiling, listen to
Christmas songs echoing throughout the church and
avoid the cold weather. This ice rink is
CO2 neutral and does not use electricity
or water. This church does not hold services.
So being able to serve the ice skating community
in the church is a
wonderful feeling. It's a change of scenery compared to the
outdoors. It's warmer here. It's quite pleasant. It's
unique to be able to put an ice rink
in the church combined with  the music and
lights the atmosphere is very christmas and fun

ice skating rink inside a church
